page.title: 08Landscove Entertainment
page.content: Being a scattered community the people rely mainly on the radio and television for their{entertainment} .Some 10% own or rent video recorders so they can watch their favourite programmes after work.Throughout the year there are seasonal celebrations such as Harvest Festival Barn Dance,Guy Fawkes Fireworks and Bonfire,Christmas Music in Church with mince pies and punch afterwards,and Summer Fete. People enjoy dancing to the latest records of popular music at the Victory Hall,this is called the 'Disco' and there is often cider and hot food provided by Committee menbers.Country Dances are also popular and local bands provide the lively music usually with violin,acordian and percussion.
